title: Intown Suites Premium room at 290 and 1960. Home Away From Home!
posting_body: WEELY RATE!!!
Welcome to the comfort of home.
Our new comfort rooms couldn’t have a more appropriate name.
Custom mattresses and seriously legit bedding.
We’ve also added premium TV channels, so much more storage, and a fully-furnished situation that looks like a million bucks.
Stay, play and even nap the day away.
(We won’t tell.)
All this and so much more, at a zero-stress price.
More Storage
-Built-in closets with organizers, too
-Bathroom vanities and shelving with 2 mirrors, for looking twice as good
-Wall hooks, aka most underrated invention ever
Added Comfort
-Crazy amazing custom mattresses with fluffier bedding
-Kitchen table for 2, for weekend catch-ups or weekday breakfast
Better Living
-Fully furnished by someone who knows what they’re doing
-FREE local & long distance calls and voicemail services
BOOK TODAY!!!
